TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AbandonedMutexException extends System.SystemException

summary.span: 當一個執行緒取得另一個執行緒已放棄，但是結束時並未釋放的 物件時，所擲回的例外狀況。

span.span: The exception that is thrown when one thread acquires a object that another thread has abandoned by exiting without releasing it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當執行緒放棄的 mutex 時下, 一個執行緒取得 mutex 的是擲回例外狀況。When a thread abandons a mutex, the exception is thrown in the next thread that acquires the mutex. 因為它已經等候 mutex 或在稍後進入的 mutex，執行緒可能取得 mutex。The thread might acquire the mutex because it was already waiting on the mutex or because it enters the mutex at a later time. 已放棄的 mutex 表示嚴重的程式設計錯誤。An abandoned mutex indicates a serious programming error. 當執行緒結束但未釋放 mutex 時，mutex 所保護的資料結構可能無法一致的狀態。When a thread exits without releasing the mutex, the data structures protected by the mutex might not be in a consistent state. 早於 2.0 版的.NET framework，這類問題難以探索，因為如果遭到放棄的 mutex 的結果，已完成等候擲不回任何例外狀況。Prior to version 2.0 of the .NET Framework, such problems were hard to discover because no exception was thrown if a wait completed as the result of an abandoned mutex. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. 要求擁有權的 mutex 的下一個執行緒可以處理這個例外狀況，並繼續進行，前提是可驗證的資料結構的完整性。The next thread to request ownership of the mutex can handle this exception and proceed, provided that the integrity of the data structures can be verified. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會執行會放棄上示範其效果的五個 mutex 的執行緒， ，和方法。The following code example executes a thread that abandons five mutexes, demonstrating their effects on the , , and methods. 值屬性會顯示呼叫。The value of the property is displayed for the call. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫方法中斷的其中一個已放棄的 mutex。The call to the method is interrupted by one of the abandoned mutexes. 已放棄的 mutex 可能仍會導致後續等候方法所擲回。The other abandoned mutex could still cause an to be thrown by subsequent wait methods. [!code-cpp[System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.AbandonedMutexException/CPP/koax.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.AbandonedMutexException/CS/koax.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.AbandonedMutexException#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Threading.AbandonedMutexException/VB/koax.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式初始化屬性的新執行個體的系統提供的訊息描述錯誤，例如 「 等候完成，因為已放棄的 mutex。 」This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "The wait completed due to an abandoned mutex." 此訊息會考量目前的系統文化特性。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表顯示 執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||系統提供的錯誤訊息字串。The system-supplied error message string.| ||`null`.`null`.| ||-（減一） 1。–1 (minus one).|

summary.span: 使用指定的錯誤訊息，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值使用這個建構函式進行初始化。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of initialized with this constructor. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`.`null`.| ||`message`.`message`.| ||`null`.`null`.| ||-（減一） 1。–1 (minus one).|

span.span: The index of the abandoned mutex in the array of wait handles if the exception is thrown for the method, or –1 if the exception is thrown for the or methods.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 進行還原序列化 (Deserialization) 期間會呼叫這個建構函式，以便重新構成經由資料流傳送的例外狀況物件。This constructor is called during deserialization to reconstitute the exception object transmitted over a stream. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XML 和 SOAP 序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md)。For more information, see [XML and SOAP Serialization](~/docs/standard/serialization/xml-and-soap-serialization.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `message` 的內容必須能讓人了解。The content of `message` is intended to be understood by humans. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值使用這個建構函式進行初始化。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of initialized with this constructor. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`inner`.`inner`.| ||`message`.`message`.| ||`null`.`null`.| ||-（減一） 1。–1 (minus one).|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容`message`的文字字串用意在於通知使用者有關例外狀況。The content of `message` is a text string intended to inform the user about the exception. 這個建構函式的呼叫端必須確保這個字串已經被當地語系化 (為了目前系統的文化特性)。The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture. 被擲回以做為前一個例外狀況直接結果的例外狀況，應該在 屬性中包含對前一個例外狀況的參考。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 屬性會傳回與傳入建構函式中相同的值；如果 `null` 屬性沒有提供內部例外值給建構函式，則傳回 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表顯示執行個體的初始屬性值使用這個建構函式進行初始化。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of initialized with this constructor. |屬性Property|值Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`inner`.`inner`.| ||`message`.`message`.| ||`handle`.`handle`.| ||`location`.`location`.|

summary.span: 取得造成例外狀況的已放棄 Mutex (若為已知)。

span.span: Gets the abandoned mutex that caused the exception, if known.

value.span: 物件，表示已放棄的 Mutex；若無法識別已放棄的 Mutex，則為 。

span.span: A object that represents the abandoned mutex, or if the abandoned mutex could not be identified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在呼叫擲回例外狀況方法中，傳回是具有最低索引陣列中的已放棄的 mutex物件傳遞給，或`null`如果找不到已放棄的 mutex識別。If the exception is thrown on a call to the method, the returned is the abandoned mutex with the lowest index in the array of objects that was passed to , or `null` if the abandoned mutex could not be identified. 如果在呼叫擲回例外狀況或是，這個屬性一律傳回`null`。If the exception is thrown on a call to or , this property always returns `null`.

summary.span: 取得造成例外狀況之已放棄 Mutex 的索引 (若為已知)。

span.span: Gets the index of the abandoned mutex that caused the exception, if known.

value.span: 等候控制代碼陣列中的索引 (已傳遞給 物件的 方法)，表示已放棄的 Mutex；如果無法判斷已放棄 Mutex 的索引，則為 -1。

span.span: The index, in the array of wait handles passed to the method, of the object that represents the abandoned mutex, or –1 if the index of the abandoned mutex could not be determined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在呼叫擲回例外狀況方法，這個屬性會傳回具有最低索引已放棄的 mutex 的索引陣列中的物件傳遞給，則為 – 1，如果無法識別已放棄的 mutex.If the exception is thrown on a call to the method, this property returns the index of the abandoned mutex with the lowest index in the array of objects that was passed to , or –1 if the abandoned mutex could not be identified. 如果在呼叫擲回例外狀況或，這個屬性一律會傳回-1。If the exception is thrown on a call to or , this property always returns –1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會執行放棄五個 mutex 的執行緒。The following code example executes a thread that abandons five mutexes. 已放棄的 mutex 用來示範上的效果， ，和方法呼叫。The abandoned mutexes are used to demonstrate the effects on the , , and method calls. 值屬性會顯示呼叫。The value of the property is displayed for the call. > [!NOTE] > 若要呼叫中斷的其中一個已放棄的 mutex。The call to is interrupted by one of the abandoned mutexes. 已放棄的 mutex 可能仍會導致後續等候方法所擲回。The other abandoned mutex could still cause an to be thrown by subsequent wait methods.
